title: ProductRecord
description:
A product object `record_type=product`.
Product records are used to represent the current and historical products offered by your brand, including your product taxonomy.
The field referenced in `product_reference_type` should be unique and used in purchase and return events.

product_id.title: Product ID
product_id.description: Unique product_id. Required if `product_id` is used as the product identifier in `product_reference_type`.

sku.title: SKU
sku.description: Unique SKU. Required if `sku` is used as a product identifier in `product_reference_type`.

upc.title: UPC
upc.description: Unique UPC. Required if `upc` is used as a product identifier in `product_reference_type`.

product_reference_type.title: Product Reference Type
product_reference_type.description: Which field is used to identify the product entity. A value must be provided in the specified field.

description.title: Description
examples: Whether your look is clean and casual or sharp and sophisticated, Staple Superior has what you need to achieve that effortlessly cool style.

options.title: Categories
options.description: Key value pairs of options that define the product, such as departments, categories, styles, etc.

url.title: Product URL
url.description: A URL to the product listed on the public internet - i.e., an ecommerce link.

images.title: Image URLs
images.description: An array of Product Image URLs listed on the public internet.

inventory.title: Product Inventory
inventory.description: The inventory status of the product.

available.title: Available
available.description: Is the product available for purchase via this specific channel?

published_at.title: Published At
published_at.description: An ISO8601 datetime string for when the product was published, or is going to be published to this channel.

unpublished_at.title: Unpublished At
unpublished_at.description: An ISO8601 datetime string for when the product was unpublished, or is going to be unpublished to this channel.

available.title: Available
available.description: A product is available when it is suitable for sale in any channel, or can be promoted in marketing communications.

channels_availability.title: Channels Availability
channels_availability.description: A list of channel specific availability statuses.

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of product in the inventory system

source.title: Source
source.description: Source of inventory product data, e.g. Shopify, Magento..

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Total number of remaining product units

cost.title: Cost
cost.description: Total expenditure incurred to produce, store and sell one unit of product

backorder_allowed.title: Backorder Allowed
backorder_allowed.description: Can the product item be ordered when it's out of stock?

tracked.title: Tracked
tracked.description: Is the product quantity being tracked?

updated_at.title: Updated At
updated_at.description: An ISO8601 datetime string for when the product inventory status was last updated
